id: Joy Behar dishes on Trump's wedding and why he's 'an anarchist'
paragraph: Co-Host of “The View” on ABC, Joy Behar sits down with Ari Melber ahead of midterm elections to discuss everything from possible 2020 Democrat contenders, to gun control, to Fred Armisen’s impression of her on SNL. Behar, who has interviewed Donald Trump several times, tells Ari Melber about his second wedding and says she doesn’t see Trump as a Republican or a Democrat, but as an “anarchist”.Oct. 30, 2018© 2018 NBC UNIVERSAL
